I

ifGenerateButtonIsPressedThenGenerateReport() - Method in class controller.Controller
This method is used to generate the report.
ifStartButtonIsPressedThenStartTimer() - Method in class controller.Controller
This method implements an ActionListener to start the timer, disable the start button and to enable the stop button.
ifStopButtonIsPressedThenStopTimer() - Method in class controller.Controller
This method implements an ActionListener to:
Stop the clock Setting the task model object to be saved Save the task in the DB and in the file Add the row on the table Reset the timer Erase the task description Disable the stop button
initDaily() - Method in class controller.Controller
This method initialize the Daily, it retrieves all the task executed today.
initDaily() - Method in class controller.DailyManager
This method initialize the Daily.
It calls the DAO to retrieve all the tasks executed today through the method getDailyTask.
initFileManager(String, boolean) - Method in class controller.persistence.FileManager
This method initialize the file manager by creating and or opening the file.
initView(View) - Method in class controller.Controller
This method initialize the view:
Timer initialization, it puts the string "00:00:00" on the timer Event listener for the text area for the task description Event listener for the start button Event listener for the stop button Event listener for the report generation button Initialization of the Daily (list of tasks of today)
isTaskDescriptionEmpty() - Method in class controller.Controller
This method just checks if the task description is empty or not.
